alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 15 at 10:31AM EST until December 19 at 8:43PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Columbia SC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Lexington, Richland and Calhoun Counties. Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Richland and Calhoun Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Congaree River At Carolina Eastman. * WHEN...From late Friday night to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 115.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park. At 119.0 feet, Extensive flooding occurs in the Congaree National Park. Some area farmland is flooded. Minor flooding occurs at the Carolina Eastman Facility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 107.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 117.8 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 115.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1030 PM EST.
